text:
We will be using MyOpenMath for Math 221 Applied Calculus Fall 2025. To enroll, please follow the steps below:

1. If you already have a MyOpenMath account, please sign into it at https://www.myopenmath.com/. Otherwise, create a new account.
2. Click ‘Enroll in a New Course’.
3. Enter the Course ID: 292612 and the Enrollment Key: math221fall2025.
4. Confirm the course name is ‘Math 221 Applied Calculus Fall 2025’.
5. Start working on your assignments!

Note: If you are creating a new MyOpenMath account, please use the same name and UAA email as in Blackboard to avoid score sync issues.
